title: What Goes On
lyrics: What [E7]goes on in your heart? What goes on in your mind? You are teari ng me apart When you treat me so un kind What go es on in your mi nd? The other day I saw you, as I walked along the road It's so e asy for a gir l like you t o lie; tell me wh y I used to think of no one else, but you were just the same Did you mean to break my heart and watch me die? Tell me why
